page.title: 09ST JAMES ABATTOIR BRADFORD
page.content: The {Abattoir,} opened in 1965, comprises of Lairages, Slaughterhall, Chill rooms and a {Wholesale Meat {Market. Originally 32 small butchers rented the sales pitches but{now only 3 major {ones (accounting for 95% of the trade) and 4 minor ones remain. The large ones mainly supply supermarket chains such as{ Morrisons, Tescos etc. Cattle, sheep, calves & pigs are slaughtered by the traditional pre- stunning method and {sheep for the {Asian community are slaughtered by the {Halal method}in a new extention added in 1981. A staff of 56 dealt with 26393 cattle 119036 sheep, 42885 Halal sheep, 70579 pigs & 54 calves in 1984/5. The Abattoir made a profit for the first time last year after heavy losses for many years.
